sentence.Network_en: He hung up the phone, went to Sollozzo's side and whispered in the Turk's ear.
sentence.Network_cn: 他挂上电话, 走到索洛佐身旁,凑近这个“土耳其人”的耳朵,叽叽咕咕地小声说了些什么.

means.word_mean: 1. lily of the eastern United States with orange to red maroon-spotted flowers
